scripts.deploy:ic:frontend: npm run build --workspace=anon_board_frontend && dfx deploy --network ic anon_board_frontend --mode upgrade
scripts.deploy:ic:all: npm run build --workspace=anon_board_frontend && dfx deploy --network ic
scripts.deploy:ic:v2:frontend: npm run build --workspace=anon_board_frontend && dfx deploy --network ic anon_board_frontend_v2
scripts.deploy:ic:v2:all: npm run build --workspace=anon_board_frontend && dfx deploy --network ic anon_board_backend_v2 anon_board_frontend_v2
